channel.title: Hackers
channel.description: So my account got hacked around 3 months ago, and I've been trying to recover it for the past 2 weeks or so, and most of my appeals get accepted, [b]but[/b] the hacker instantly hacks the account back via email recovery.. How can I ensure that he can't get the account back after I recover it? Thanks. <3

item.title: Hackers
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

I provided enough info, they just need the creation info now, which I forgot…

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

LOL:

Go to their .tk website, find out the real url (http://r9unesc4pe.t35.com) and it says “Index of Galkon’s Phiser”. Nice… Submit in some random letters and it will tell you that your mod app was accepted.

I love looking at how hard people fail with their phishers.

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

Well someone got my password and sent me a message in-game telling me he was “sending me money” which was supposedly a new update Jagex added. Then he told me to re-log so it could work. Naturally I got suspicious… So I told him to wait a bit, and tried logging on the Jagex homepage. Unsurprisingly, it said “wrong username/password”, so I recovered using my e-mail, set in a new password, and am now setting my bank pin.

To cut a long story short, set a bank pin, set an e-mail, and you should be safe if you put your valuables in your bank (which you should be doing anyway).

Only thing I’m wondering about is how they actually did get my password. I am now scanning my computer for any malware and am pretty sure I will come up with something, because someone weird was logged into my other account(s) as well.

I’m sorry for you JC, try e-mailing Jagex as above posters said, and check your computer for keyloggers and such :\ Not much else you can do, except save your items by going on as soon as you recover, taking your items and starting over.

Sorry

EDIT: this is a true story

Read full topic

item.title: Hackers
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

Jc22493:

So my account got hacked around 3 months ago, and I’ve been trying to recover it for the past 2 weeks or so, and most of my appeals get accepted, but the hacker instantly hacks the account back via email recovery… How can I ensure that he can’t get the account back after I recover it? Thanks. <3

Just get the account and then go to Email settings delete his Email and put yours and then in 14 days recover it again. Theres a 14 day wait to cancel and set a new Email…

Read full topic
